page.title: 13Education
page.content: On starting Infants you are introduced to Spelling, Tables,Story,various play activities,P.E.,Telivision,Art & Craft Number,Music,Cooking and Swimming.Then in Juniors,work increases.Play stops. Now subjects include Mathematics,P.E. English,Project, Art and Craft,Games & Swimming.After leaving Juniors, you go to York Street.History and Geography replace Project.New lessons include Religious Education, Tutorial and Creative Arts:cooking,sewing,woodwork, drama,art and metalwork.French,is also introduced.All lessons are either 35mins. or 70mins. long .Forest View is next.Lessons are the same except for Technical Drawing,German, and Careers.Then it is on to Manor.As well as Maths and English,you have a choice of 4 other subjects.Secondary Schools expect far more of you,but all schools prepare you for your future.
